entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
